creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: slightly stooped figure at right, wearing cap with checkered brim, shawl and skirt, leaning on a cane, talking to three elves with large ears, wearing tunics and tights; landscape in background with foliage and trees
provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
title: The Meeting
